sect1.title: Mailing lists
sect1.para: The linuxfromscratch.org server is hosting a number of mailinglists that are used for the development of the LFS project. These lists include, among others, the main development and support lists.
For more information regarding which lists are available, how to subscribe to them, archive locations, etc. visit http://www.linuxfromscratch.org/mailinglists.
